Reviews.Title: “Always satisfied”
Reviews.Author: grapesnocone
Reviews.Content: Our family owns a couple of weeks and we love it. As for the lack of a sauna and fitness center...I am on vacation and don't want to work out. If I did, I'd run or bike on the beach. Also, I am in the insurance claims business and I have heard horror stories about how much bacteria there is in a hotel hot tub, I don't let kids near them. As for kids in general, I think the staff does a pretty good job. I don't think the floaty thing is a big deal now as long as the pool is not very crowded. We can fly into Orlando and take day trips to St. Augustine or the Cape. One year we stayed two days at Disney and we were SO happy to get to Sea Club and just sit on our balcony and listen to the waves. Going again in 3 months and counting the days.

Reviews.Title: “Owner”
Reviews.Author: Jim O
Reviews.Content: I've been an owner for about thirty years ever since Sea Club first opened and could not be more pleased with my investment. Sea Club has everything we're looking for in a vacation spot along the coast. Location is paramount with this property as you can walk directly to the beach and every unit has an ocean view. Shopping is close and the staff are first rate. The best part is seeing our old friends that we have made over the years in such a relaxing environment. Just wish I had more vacation time!!

Reviews.Title: “Multiple Stays”
Reviews.Author: John L
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here for one and sometimes more than one week for the past 4 years. We keep returning because it has always been a pleasing experience. The place is well managed and has an exceptional pleasant staff. Some of the units appear a little dated but we have observed grading to be ongoing each year. It is a great location for day trips such as the space center, Orlando attractions, St Augustine and locally Daytona speedway. Never experienced it but if you like quite avoid bike week. If you are looking for a resort with managed activities look elsewhere. If you want pleasant beachfront, nice pool & deck for families and couples this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “I LOVE THIS PLACE!”
Reviews.Author: Cornnugget
Reviews.Content: We stay 2 weeks every year and we love it! Its clean, the staff is amazing, beach is AWESOME, love the area! We have made many friends that are owners there as well! My favorite place in the world!

Reviews.Title: “Time share owner”
Reviews.Author: Chelle3655
Reviews.Content: If you live around the area and you're looking for a time share to stay at and use the facilities all year round because driving on the beach can be very damaging to your car, this is NOT the place to get one. They are so strict and want you to call before you come to use the pool, and they still say it's too busy and not enough room for you to come that day. Yet, you will drive by and there will be plenty of parking and hardly anyone at the pool when you drive by on the beach. Not to mention if you are under the age of 70, the manger treats you like crap. I am 23 years old and the manger told me I needed to be with an adult. And, it's NOT because I was running around screaming acting a fool or anything, I simply just wanted to use the pool for the day. I can't wait to see what the remodeled rooms look like because I can guarantee it's not nice enough for the extra money that I paid to have it done last year which was not done for my room last year even though I had paid for it already last year. Look around before buying because I have been looking for other condos around the area to buy after this year. And, for the same price as Sea Club, you can get a condo with a hot tub, sauna, gym, and much more. Once again, I can not wait to sell this place for a place that will treat me with respect and have nice employees. Out of the 3 people I deal with at Sea Club, only 1 of them is actually nice and friendly and that is probably because she is new!

Reviews.Title: “Not family friendly”
Reviews.Author: Danielle B
Reviews.Content: I am shocked to read the good reviews coming from this place because this has def not been my experience. I have been a time share owner for a couple of years now and I am very disappointed with the way my family is treated. This is not a "family friendly" establishment. There is a very strict no float policy in the pool, even for infants! I undersatnd not wanting big floats taking up the pool, but to tell a 6 month old child that he has to use a noodle as a float is ridiculous!! The managment staff is very belittling to us. I work in customer service and I would never tolorate my staff treating people the way we are treated at this establishment. I can't wait to sell this timeshare and switch to a friendlier place. Not to mention that there is no hot-tub or fitness center, the place is pretty dated (even after the re-model), they still use window units as air conditioning, and the cleaning leaves a lot to be desired.

Reviews.Title: “Very good place recommend”
Reviews.Author: GoodReviewerSantiago
Reviews.Content: Sea Club IV is a very nice place to stay. It has a private pool and access to the beach, which is excellent. It also has a very helpful foot-washing station to clean your feet of sand when returning. The vacationers were a very good set of people and it seems like Sea Club attracts the right type of clients. Sea Club rooms are basically mini-apartments with huge windows overlooking the ocean. They are nicely furnished with quality items and a decent TV. The living room converts to a bedroom at night using a wall bed. There was some debate about the linens. My wife thought they might not be clean because she found some hairs but I think they were clean and they were just some random hairs. Besides that, the atmosphere is very relaxing. The kitchen was perfect. The bathroom in our room was just average because the tub was older and the water took a while to get hot upon first use. The staff was nice but not overly friendly. For instance, there was a major storm approaching when we did a random stop to ask about vacancies. They would have been fine not to mention the storm at all to the unaware, which seems too strictly business for my taste, but that's what it is after all so caveat emptor. The place felt very safe although we saw cops pull over a vehicle at one point in next hotel over. It's Datona Beach so probably just some teenagers acting stupid. Didn't think the parked vehicles are in much danger. All in all, a very good place that I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Small and nice”
Reviews.Author: BluffDave
Reviews.Content: We just completed a week at the Sea Club. We found it to be a very nice, quiet, clean, and enjoyable place to spend a week. It is not a big resort and the staff was very friendly, helpful, and courteous.

Reviews.Title: “We are timeshare owners!”
Reviews.Author: mooreantiques2
Reviews.Content: The updates are great, much improved. Staff are outstanding, especially laundry room staff. Can't wait to return next year. Home away from Home - only better - we have the pool and the beach!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “great spot very clean friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: RoundLakeRebel
Reviews.Content: Just back from a 2 week stay April 14th to April 28th. The resort has just completed renos and they have done a great job. Pool area was super clean as was the BBQ area, The staff wash down the pool deck every day and make sure the BBQ's are in top working condition and cleaned every day. The unit had everything we needed and because we had 2 weeks in a row they actually had cleaning staff clean our unit 1/2 way thru our stay. The resort is child friendly with a kiddie pool. If your looking for a clean and quite relaxing vacation on Daytona Beach, this is the spot to go. If you have any questions please feel free to email me @ brijo82@hotmail.com and I will try to answer any questions. Rouindlakerebel.

Reviews.Title: “25 Yeare Timesharing---A Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Robert R
Reviews.Content: This resort is a small 40 unit resort directly on the beach. The newly refurbished units are very well done with everything you would expect. The staff were all very helpful and always available to assist. Very well maintained inside and out. The pool area directly on the beach and very well maintained. If you are looking for a relaxing vacation in a friendly atmosphere this is the place. The manager (Michael) is doing a great job to ensure your vacation is up to your expectation. We will return

Reviews.Title: “Really enjoyed our stay here, will be back”
Reviews.Author: Ktoo
Reviews.Content: My son and his girlfriend and daughter and her boyfriend booked this as a timeshare trade, and I visited for about half the week. It was a one bedroom with pullout sofa and Murphy bed in the living room, two full baths and kitchen. It was roomy, clean, and well stocked. The only sleeping problem we ran into was the pullout sofa which had an extremely lumpy/dippy mattress, but since it was only accommodating one person (me) I just slept directly on the sofa and solved that problem. It would have been a real issue if it had been a third couple, but that was the only bobble we experienced. There is plenty of storage space for all the stuff you drag along with you to the beach, and the balcony is huge and overlooks the pool and ocean. Everyone in the management office was friendly and helpful. Will definitely return, we liked the location, the size and the amenities here.

Reviews.Title: “We will return!”
Reviews.Author: greatnw2
Reviews.Content: The staff is personable, respectable, and knows the meaning of customer service. It is clean and every room has a view. Very reasonable rates. It was hard sometimes to get down to pick up towels before the cut off time. I never tried to get them after noon but, I am sure that someone would have helped us. Parking leaves a lot to be desired if you have company but, the hotel right next door let us park in there lot for a small fee. We could see the vehicles & we did not have to walk down & across the street to the unsecured, dirt parking lot that was recommended. The murphy bed and the pull out couch are as comfortable as you expect them to be. If you do it right on vacation though you will not care due to being so tired. We had a great time & we will return!

Reviews.Title: “Going back every summer and lovin it.”
Reviews.Author: tracyrt2011
Reviews.Content: My family has went to this condo every summer for the past several years and we love it. We have never had a bad experience so far and don't expect to. Our room is always clean when and well stocked when we arrive and never have problems getting clean linens upon request. The location is great with access to the beach front and also a nice pool area that has been upgraded. The only complaint I could have is the internet access is not all that great but I expect that will be upgraded as well in the near future. The best thing I like is the staff and the wednesday morning social with coffee and donuts.

Reviews.Title: “Great location!!!Great location!!!”
Reviews.Author: wework2travel
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with my parents and kids, 6 of us total in the one bedroom, there was a wueen bed, murphy bed and pullout couch with a small kitchen). All the rooms have a ocean view. I was a liitle afraid of staying here after my dad showed me this place that he booked thru RCI. It looked extremely dated. However when we got there I was pleasantly surprised, it was dated but still nice and clean. (i overhead that they will be renovating soon) The pool was heated and there were pool towels for us to use which is great so we dont have to pack them. The beach was GREAT, the sand was fine and smooth, there were only small shells which are great for the feet not so great for shell hunting although our kids didnt mind. We loved Aunt Catfish's restaurant and the the Crab Shack which is the restaurant right on the pier (we walked there from the Sea Club). Its definitely not a Ritz Carlton but I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We liked it so much we bought 2 weeks”
Reviews.Author: RoundLakeRebel
Reviews.Content: Over all booking and check in was super smooth. We arrived to our condo around 130 pm and all was ready. Unit was spotless and very well equipped. They exchange towels and bedding anytime you wish. Pool towels are exchanged everyday if you wish. Grounds are spotless, every morning as early as 6am 2 guys begin refreshing the entire pool deck every day. Constantly clean and maintain the SS Weber BBQ;s. Never have to woryy about deck loungers or chairs, there aree plenty. Pool was very comfortable as was the ocean. The sandy beach is a one of a kind, always lots of action. Staff was always very accomadating. They even booked us a tee time @ LPGA National golf course without any hesitation. We stayed 1 week here and 1 week on Gulf coast, my wife and I both wish we would have spent the entire 2 weeks @ Sea Club IV Daytona Shores. Like the title says we liked it so much we bought 2 weeks as soon as we got home. You cant go wrong with this property.

Reviews.Title: “Our First Stay at Sea Club IV”
Reviews.Author: Nikemac2
Reviews.Content: We vacationed for 2 weeks at Sea Club IV at the end of January, 2011. The thing that impressed us the most about our stay was the helpfulness of the people who work there. The building has been well maintained and the grounds are spotless. The pool area is the perfect size for the number of units available, with very comfortable lounge chairs and numerous tables with umbrellas and chairs. Every room has a great view of Daytona Beach which you can walk down the stairs to enjoy. Miles of flat sand make for long walks and beach combing. Pelicans, gulls, terns, and Egrets keep you company on these walks. Our unit will sleep 6 with a murphy bed and hide-a-bed sofa in the living room, and a queen in the bedroom. It also had a kitchen and 2 baths. While we were there, the board of directors picked out the new furnishings and floor designs that will be updated in the coming year. We visited Blue Spring State Park for a fantastic tour, spotting everything from manatees, alligators, bald eagles, and other bird species, too many to mention. We also made the trip to St. Augustine to explore the city with such great history. Next trip, we'll head to the Kennedy Space Center at Cape Canaveral which is also a short drive from Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Great!!”
Reviews.Author: trvlrfromco
Reviews.Content: Absolutely fantastic management and service. Everyone was really friendly. I was worried about the Murphy bed - but it was the most comfortable mattress I've ever slept on - including mine at home! I had a studio and it was fine for me - but any more than 2 people would feel cramped. My unit needed to be updated (which doesn't bother me) and I heard over the next year they are redoing unit by unit. I loved the pool - except beware that the sun disappears behind the building by 1 pm - as it does for all high-rise buildings facing east in November. I was on 5th floor and had a fantastic view. The room would be quiet - except I was very near a family with very young children who like to play out on their balcony by 7 or 8 am. Not that they were too excessive - just very close to my bed which is by my balcony door, so they were just a few feet away.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!!!”
Reviews.Author: Leo-and-Elly
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the first week of December and loved the place. It’s very clean, everybody is very nice and helpful. All apartments are spacious and have a wonderful ocean view. A few steps and you’re on the beach, we walked a lot. The Publix grocery store is a ten minute walk away. We did not rent a car and the public transport in Daytona Beach is surprisingly good, the nearest bus stop is nearby. Place is quiet, if you want to relax, this is the perfect place!

Reviews.Title: “Great little place.”
Reviews.Author: helpfulinillinois
Reviews.Content: The service is tops. Everyone from the front desk staff to maintenance staff were nice, friendly and helpful. They called to check every couple of days to make sure everything in our unit was ok and if they could do anything to make our stay better. Our room (103) was just the right size for the two of us. Neither bed was very comfortable but I tend to think that happens anytime I sleep in a different bed. Appliances were all new and even had a dishwasher. Plenty of clothes storage in the closet and 4 drawer dresser. We had a wonderful patio with a table, four chairs and an umbrella right outside the sliding doors. With this unit you are fortunate to walk over to the gate and down a few steps to the pool and pool deck. Plenty of chairs and tables there also. Has a nice size regular pool and a cute little one for kids although we didn't see many during our stay. There is a laundry room on the first floor with one washer and one dryer but made traveling light much easier. View is great since the condo is in a "V" shape so every unit overlooks the pool and the ocean. Lots of restaurants and shops nearby to anything you might have forgotten.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to relax!”
Reviews.Author: krisMinnesota
Reviews.Content: Don't let the outside picture fool you. I thought this would be a rather run down late 1950's/1960's property. Everything is is great condition - from clean paint on the iron gate that seperates the pll area from the building and beach to new appliances in the kitchen of my unit. The Murphy bed had a good matress on it. Did not use the sleeper sofa as I was traveling alone. Studio unit kitchen was stocked for 4 people. Dishwasher, stove/oven and full-sized refrigerator with icemaker in the freezer. A huge grocery store is about 1/2 mile to the north and ABC Liquore store .3 mile to the south. The pool and deck is cleaned daily with beach chairs, umbrella tables all in excellent condition. There are two gas grills with picnic tables poolside and these were used by guests alot! You are steps away from the beach with great smooth sand for miles of walking if you like. Every hotel unit has a private balcony facing the ocean. Staff from front desk reception to laundry is great and very helpfull. Most guests staying while I was there were families. This is the perfect place for very young children or those who simply want to relax and get lots of sun! I would not encourage families with teenagers as there are not beach front activities such as: vollyball, para -sailing, etc. such as you find in more of the "gold zone" popular beaches. This property is about 10 miles from the airport. I used taxi service and had no problems with this service. I definately rate Sea Club IV a 10 !!!

Reviews.Title: “10 years running”
Reviews.Author: ScooterDaytona
Reviews.Content: We along with 30-40 family and friends stay at Sea Club every spring break, WOULD NOT THINK ABOUT MOVING. We all overrun this property and they still welcome us back every year, Claudette and the whole crew always have a smile and an answer to every dumb question we have. The pool area has to be the cleanest on the eastern seaboard, the rooms are exceptional for everyone's week long stay AND you will not find a better beach to boogie board anywhere.

Reviews.Title: “This place, the Sea Club IV, grew on me.”
Reviews.Author: I_Like_Florida
Reviews.Content: On July 3 we received an email with a last-minute offer to rent a Sea Club IV one bedroom unit starting the next day (July 4-11)! We negotiated a good price and checked in the following day. I was a bit taken back at first by the size (small) of the bedroom. It had a bed (queen, or was it just a full?), one nightstand, and a small dresser with a TV on top; also there was a decent closet and a small window facing out to the exterior hallway. No pictures on the wall and no chair to sit on. The balcony was also very small. Most of the units here have a nice size balcony, but our unit, at the middle of the V (room 204) had a small wedge of a balcony, but at least it did have two chairs and a small table. All the balconies are oceanfront and have nice views of the pool area and beach. The living room was pretty decent, with both a queen size sleeper and a queen size Murphy bed, so this one bedroom was rated to sleep six, more than most one bedroom units at other resorts. There is no jacuzzi at this resort, a big negative in my book, but the pool was warm enough (and I understand they heat it to 82 during the colder months). The employees were friendly and helpful, something you don't always see at timeshares. The resort is run by a board of owners, not just a timeshare company like Diamond Resorts or Bluegreen, so the board is trying to keep expenses down, but also make the place nice. Not too many amenities other than the pool (and, of course, the beach). They do have BBQ grills, shuffleboard, free wireless internet, and even a computer in the lobbby available for free use. There are no VCRs or DVD players in the room, but they have a limited number than you can check out (for free, but with a $50 deposit). Another plus is that they have very nice (thick and new looking) pool towels and they allow you to bring down any or all of your towels & linens for exchange any morning. Our kitchen inventory was complete. We had a couple minor room problems, but the maintenance staff handled them in a timely manner. Parking is limited, but easy. No underground parking here. You do need to watch, though, for palm tree droppings which can damage your car's paint job. So, by the end of our week, I had kind of adjusted to the small bedroom and balcony. I missed the jacuzzi, but was favorably impressed by the helpfulness of the staff and found it a relazing and nice place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “great time!”
Reviews.Author: Beach1122
Reviews.Content: we stayed here in october of 2008.... we had a wonderful time! the doors let a little air under them, which makes a noise, but if you put a towel in front of the door the problem is taken care of.... there was a lil sea weed washing up in the waves but it stopped after a day or so... but this was a great hotel and has wonderful view of the ocean... the hotel is in the shape of a V so all rooms have a view the ocean , which i thought was pretty cool.... our room had 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms(one queen and the master w a king), a sleeper sofa, a murpheys (spell?) bed , a little dinning area and a full kitchen. So we had plenty of room. Oh and we were also able to check in early with no extra charge! they have free Wifi but we were on the top floor so we had a little trouble with the reception, but went down stairs and it worked fine, the also have a computer with internet access that you can use for no extra charge... and you can also view the ocean and the heated pool while you are using the computer ... :)

Reviews.Title: “The BEST!”
Reviews.Author: MellowOchre
Reviews.Content: This is absolutely the best place to stay in Daytona Beach. Our unit was seaside on the 4th floor floor and was great. This place is small and quiet but right in the middle of everything with a whole lot to do.

HotelInfo.Name: Sea Club IV
HotelInfo.Address: 3229 S. Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, FL 32118
